```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r,message=FALSE}
timestamp()
library(TCGAbiolinks)
proj = "TCGA-CESC"

query_CNV <- GDCquery(
  project = proj,
  data.category = "Copy Number Variation",
  data.type = "Copy Number Segment"
)
CNV <- GDCprepare(
  query = query_CNV,
  save = TRUE,
  save.filename = paste0(proj,"CNV.rda")
)
CNV <- CNV[,c('Sample','Chromosome','Start','End','Num_Probes','Segment_Mean')]
CNV <- CNV[substr(CNV$Sample,14,15) == "01",]
write.table(CNV,file = paste0(proj,"_seg.txt"),sep = "\t",col.names = TRUE,
            row.names = FALSE)

timestamp()
```
